plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit

No. 00-1621

                      JOHN M. MCCAMBRIDGE,

                     Petitioner, Appellant,

                               v.

                  TIMOTHY HALL, SUPERINTENDENT,

                      Respondent, Appellee.




                          ERRATA SHEET

     The opinion of this court, issued August 27, 2002, should be
amended as follows:

Page 7, line 26: insert "was" between "McCambridge" and "in"
